Registry of Open Data on AWS

IRS 990 Filings

regulatory statistics

Description

Machine-readable data from certain electronic 990 forms filed with the IRS from 2013 to present.

Update Frequency

New filings are added regularly

License

None

Documentation

https://docs.opendata.aws/irs-990/readme.html

Contact

https://www.irs.gov/e-file-providers/e-file-for-charities-and-non-profits

Usage Examples

Tutorials
  • Tutorial on using the IRS 990 e-file dataset by 990 Consulting, LLC
Tools & Applications
  • 990_long by Charity Navigator
  • aws-irs-990-explorer by Chris Herbert
  • Grantmakers.io by Chad Kruse
  • Guide to Open Data for Nonprofit Research by lecy
  • Non Profit Light by Non Profit Light
  • Nonprofit Explorer by ProPublica
  • npo_classifier: Automated coding using machine-learning and remapping the U.S. nonprofit sector by Ji Ma
  • Open990 by 990 Consulting, LLC
  • Parse 990 XML using IRSx by Jacob Fenton

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    xml, json, csv
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::irs-form-990
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://irs-form-990/ --no-sign-request
